channel.title: [PI] Login Issue
channel.description: So i dont get any errors in eclipse, not in the console also.. But after a while my players get dced, and it says Your account is already logged in blabla.. Or it just kicks them out instant.. Does anyone know how i can fix this ? Thanks in advance.

item.title: [PI] Login Issue
item.dc:creator: @StonedC0D3r StonedC0D3r
item.description:
@StonedC0D3r wrote:

I dont think so man, because now it has been running for a few hours without problem… Maybe if i find a autorestarter somewhere, would this help ?

Also, maybe this has something to do with it ?
[23/03/13 18:28]: [player-2]: Fatal: Internal error: unable to determine connection vertex! wp1=(62, 47), wp2=(61, 48), first=(63, 49)
[23/03/13 18:28]: [player-2]: Invalid waypoint in walking queue!
[23/03/13 18:28]: [player-2]: Fatal: couldn’t find connection vertex! Dropping packet.
[23/03/13 18:28]: [player-2]: Fatal: couldn’t find connection vertex! Dropping packet.
[23/03/13 18:28]: [player-2]: Fatal: couldn’t find connection vertex! Dropping packet.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Login Issue
item.dc:creator: @JavaLearner JavaLearner
item.description:
@JavaLearner wrote:

And is it always after a fixed amount of time? If so, then it’s just an automatic server rebooter.

Read full topic
